Assassin's Mark.name: Assassin's Mark
Assassin's Mark.description: Innate: Akali's ability damage against enemy  champions creates a 500-unit ring around them for 4 seconds and grants her  40 / 50 / 60 / 70% (based on level) bonus movement speed for 2 seconds while moving away from them.
Assassin's Mark.description2: If Akali leaves the ring within its duration, she regains the  bonus movement speed towards enemy champions for 2 seconds and gains Swinging Kama for 4 seconds.
Assassin's Mark.description3: Swinging Kama: Akali's next basic attack range is doubled, deals 39 −  180 (based on level) (+ 60% bonus AD) (+ 50% AP)  bonus magic damage and restores  10 / 15 / 20 (based on level) energy.
Assassin's Mark.notes:
* Swinging Kama gives a static bonus range which doesn't change if Akali's range changes during it (i.e  Rapid Firecannon):
 If Rapid Firecannon fully charges within Swinging Kama's duration, Akali's total range increases to 337.5.
 If Rapid Firecannon fully charges before gaining Swinging Kama, Akali's total range is increased to 395.

 The ring will create around the last target hit of  Five Point Strike.
 If the ability damage is negated, she will not be granted Assassin's Mark.

Five Point Strike.name: Five Point Strike
Five Point Strike.description: Active: Akali throws a flurry of kunais in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies hit. Enemies hit at maximum range are also  slowed by 50% for 0.5 seconds.
Five Point Strike.description2: At rank 5, deals  25% bonus magic damage    156.25 (+ 81.25% AD) (+ 75% AP) total magic damage  to  minions and  monsters.

Twilight Shroud.name: Twilight Shroud
Twilight Shroud.description: Active: Akali restores  80 energy and detonates a smoke bomb in the target direction, creating a circular shroud that expands over the next 5 seconds into a ring. The shroud does not permeate terrain.
Twilight Shroud.description2: Entering the shroud renders Akali  invisible and grants her  bonus movement speed.
Twilight Shroud.description3: Akali's basic attacks and abilities will break the invisibility for 1 − 0.625 (based on minutes) seconds.
Twilight Shroud.description4: The  marked section of Twilight Shroud's will linger for the mark's duration, even after the shroud ends.
Twilight Shroud.notes:
* It is possible for Akali to detonate the smoke bomb on the far side of terrain from her current location.
 Both enemy and ally Akalis benefit from Twilight Shroud's effects.

Shuriken Flip.name: Shuriken Flip
Shuriken Flip.description: Active: Akali  flips backward and fires a shuriken forward, stopping with the first enemy hit and dealing  physical damage.
Shuriken Flip.description2: The shuriken marks the enemy or the last  smoke section hit for 3 seconds. While the target is marked, Akali can reactivate Shuriken Flip.
Shuriken Flip.description3: Recast: Akali dashes towards the marked target, consuming the mark, regardless of distance. Against enemies deals the same physical damage.
Shuriken Flip.notes: * Killing an enemy with the shuriken will still mark the last area of the Shroud hit.

Perfect Execution.name: Perfect Execution
Perfect Execution.description: Active: Akali  dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.
Perfect Execution.description2: Perfect Execution can be recast after a 2.5 second static cooldown within 10 seconds of first activation at no additional cost.
Perfect Execution.description3: Recast: Akali  dashes in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies hit, increased by 0% − 200% (based on target's missing health).
Perfect Execution.leveling3:
Minimum Magic Damage:
75 / 110 / 145 / 180 / 215 (+ 30% AP)
Maximum Magic Damage:
225 / 330 / 435 / 540 / 645 (+ 90% AP)
